title: Birth Of The Monster (The Dracula Chronicles, #5.5)
description:
THE ULTIMATE EVIL IS UPON US
Dracula sits astride his horse, surveying the battlefield below. He has defeated another Ottoman army and won back his throne for the third time. Confident in his victory, he is unaware of the events about to unfold and the plans Lucifer has for him.Prequel to the vampire arc of The Dracula Chronicles series.
author: Shane K.P. O'Neill
